title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 89.1 - Public dissemination of tariff filings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 89.1 - Public dissemination of tariff filings

State Regulations

Any consumer organization may apply in writing to any
utility company subject to the jurisdiction of the commission and request that
it be served with a summary of any tariff filings made by such company. Each
company shall keep a roster of such requests and at the time of such tariff
filing shall serve such summary upon the organizations that have made such
written requests. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
89.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
